Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Adam Henrique?

Adam Henrique is 35 years old.

When was Adam Henrique born?

Adam Henrique was born on February 6, 1990.

Where was Adam Henrique born?

Adam Henrique was born in Brantford, Canada.

How tall is Adam Henrique?

Adam Henrique is 6-0 (183 cm) tall.

How much does Adam Henrique weigh?

Adam Henrique weighs 195 lbs (88 kg).

How many goals does Adam Henrique have?

Adam Henrique had 12 goals last season and 275 goals over his career.

How many points does Adam Henrique have?

Adam Henrique had 27 points last season and 557 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Adam Henrique won?

Adam Henrique has never won a Stanley Cup as a player.
